name: Maksim Georgiev Marinov
description: I'm Maksim Georgiev Marinov, a recent graduate of Ironhack, a web development bootcamp. Currently, I am improving my training in development and working on my own, taking online courses and training to practice new concepts and related technologies. I am open to any proposal to collaborate, participate and apply everything I acquired during my months at Ironhack. I have a passion for learning and I am eager to expand my knowledge.
